Package action

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AddOrderAction
    An action for adding orders to the records.
    BackspaceAction
    This action executes removes the last character in the quantity field.
    EditTableAction
    This action open an excel file of the table to allow adding, removing, or editing.
    MinusAction
    This action toggles the minus sign on the quantity fields.
    NumberAction
    Action to input numbers on the numpad into the quantity fields.
    PanelChangeAction
    Triggers the change of screen to a desired panel.
    PrintAction
    Triggers printing.
    QuitAction
    Action that will quit the program.
    RefreshAction
    Action to refresh the entire program, used to update the tables or other information to see what the others have entered after the other made some changes to the table files.
